lat = g[0]["geometry"]["location"]["lat"]

```py
# geocode the entire dataframe:

def geocode(add):
    g = gmaps_key.geocode(add)
    lat = g[0]["geometry"]["location"]["lat"]
    lng = g[0]["geometry"]["location"]["lng"]
    return (lat, lng)

df['geocoded'] = df['Address'].apply(geocode)
```
